remarks: For any transposition there are two points it is transposing. (Contributed by SO, 15-Jul-2018.)
statement:
pmtrrn.t $e |- T = ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
pmtrrn.r $e |- R = ran T $.
pmtrrn2 $p |- ( F e. R -> E. x e. D E. y e. D ( x =/= y /\ F = ( T ` { x , y } ) ) ) $.
$d D x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d x y $.
